summary: Defines a Graph Convolutional Network (GCN) model using DGL's GraphConv layer and PyTorch, encapsulating the architecture and forward pass for generating node or graph embeddings from graph-structured data.
business_intent: Supply a reusable GCN implementation that can be integrated into graph representation learning pipelines, such as Deep Graph Infomax, to enable downstream tasks like node classification, clustering, or link prediction.
